description:
spec: delete references to unsafe.Reflect,Typeof,Unreflect
They have been deleted from package unsafe.
Also delete their appearance in exp/types.

Fixes issue 3338.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to

spec: delete references to unsafe.Reflect,Typeof,Unreflect
They have been deleted from package unsafe.
Also delete their appearance in exp/types.

Fixes issue 3338.

It's just a clear-cut deletion, so I'm submitting based on one LGTM.

Just noticed someone, only hours ago, filed this as an issue. Total coincidence.

-rob
